title: UNKNOWN ERROR
body:
When trying to purchase anything in the shop.   ie. purchase riot points.   purchase champions with IP.  or skins.  or runes.  i get the same error .  Unknown error.     Any help on this topic?  anyone else have the issue and able to fix it.  ?   

An error has Occurred
unable to purchase item: unknown error

Have been having this issue for about a month now.

replies.body:
Store issues can be caused by a number of factors, but Internet Explorer settings are usually the biggest culprit. Since our store heavily relies on those settings to function, any number of wrong configurations could cause big issues! Check out our [Store Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) for the list of common solutions.

Let me know if this helped.
